entry.title: Fidelity-bonded ledgers
entry.summary: In a post by Peter Todd on February 25, 2013, he suggests taking away everything but the transaction/scripting. He gives credit to Gregory Maxwell for his ideas about adding unspent-chaum-token redemption op-codes to Bitcoin proper that lead him down the path to the more general Fidelity-Bonded Ledger idea. The post ends with Todd's contact information.
